reason: Question asks about school admin office tasks (학교 행정실에서 처리하는 업무) but answer just dumps the full 청원휴직 심사기준 from page 253 without addressing admin office-specific tasks. Question-answer mismatch.
Duplicate answer with q_3_1157. Same source page 253, same source.text, and nearly identical answer content. Question is a trivial rephrasing.
Duplicate answer with q_3_1157 and q_3_1158. Same page 253 content regurgitated with a slightly different intro. All three entries cover the same material identically.
Duplicate answer with q_3_1157/1158/1160. Same page 253 source, same answer content. Four entries now with effectively identical answers.
Duplicate answer with q_3_1157/1158/1160/1162. Question asks about mandatory verification items (필수 확인 사항) for admin processing but answer just dumps the same 심사기준 content.

Question asks about common problems (흔히 발생하는 문제점) when applying the criteria, but answer just restates the criteria themselves without discussing any problems. Also duplicate answer content with q_3_1157-1163.

Question asks about qualification requirements (자격 요건) but answer dumps procedural rules from page 254 (items 4-8) about delegation of authority and process steps, not individual qualifications. Question-answer mismatch.
Duplicate answer with q_3_1165. Same page 254 source, virtually identical answer content covering items 4-8.

Question asks about required documents (필요한 서류) but answer lists procedural criteria from page 254 without mentioning any specific documents. Source material contains no document requirements. Question-answer mismatch, plus duplicate answer with q_3_1165/1166.
Duplicate answer with q_3_1165/1166/1167. Same page 254 source, same answer content. Question is a trivial rephrasing of q_3_1166.
